Job Description:
Capabilities: 



0 to 5 years of experience in software development 

Should have expertise in network protocol and/or device drivers development

Persons with WLAN (Wireless LAN) domain expertise such as 802. 11 a/b/g/n are preferred

Hands- on experience of embedded device driver development on popular RTOS,  experience with Linux internals and drivers would be preferred. 

Strong C/C   programming skills. 

Ability to design,  develop and lead independently large features and take ownership of important modules. 

Follow development processes,  reviews and integration to deliver releases. 

Should be familiar with Linux internals and embedded/RTOS programming.
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
